alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 14 at 1:08AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Utah, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 415 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 106 AM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms in the vicinity of the city of Washington. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Washington.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
